description:
Learn how to do everything that you need to do to get your business started online. Make your website, set up professional business email and create an online store.

If you are bootstrapping a startup or working for an existing business that's trying to keep costs low, and quality high you need to take this course!

Save yourself thousands, by using the same easy to use tools that professional designers wish you didn't know about. Your website is the key to your online success. You want to get it right. This course will show you how.

This course goes beyond what many other courses offer. Many other courses only cover the basics of WordPress.

My course not only introduces you to the basics, but it also shows you exactly how to build and customize your very own business site.

Don't waste your time learning code or complicated programs like DreamWeaver. You don't need it! If you know how to use a word processor and surf the internet. You can create a website for your business.

Please Note: This Course Requires that you use premium tools. I've selected these tools because they are quality and are continually updated by the developers. Making them better, faster and easier. So even if you don't do anything after you build your site, but keep it up to date your site will keep getting better!

I've selected specific premium tools that you will need to use to build your site, because they work. I've done extensive testing at my site Real Website Hints and I stand by these recommendations.

You can do everything in this course for less then $200, and that's a bargain! Professional designers would easily charge $2500 and up for the same type of site that you will learn how to build.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Your website is the centerpiece of all modern marketing strategies. It's the first place many customers will go before they do anything else with your business. Make sure you do it right.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Bonus: I'll even show you the basics of how to get your site found by your customers. Learn the basics of search engine optimization and how to set up google analytics.

With all of the valuable material in this course. I should be charging $499 for this course but I want you to avoid the frustrations I faced when I built my first site.

What do you have to Lose?

Nothing, but the opportunity to create your own amazing business website that will take your business to the next level.

This course has a full 30 Day Money Back Guarantee. If after trying my course you aren't satisfied. Return it! If what I teach doesn't work for you, you shouldn't have to pay for it! If you are in the course and lost or confused I'll help you sort it out!

Sign up and start building your site TODAY!
title: Make Your Own Business Website: Save Yourself Thousands!
